SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT i.product_code, p.product_name, sum(inventory_qy) as inventory_qy FROM inventory i join product_info p ON i.product_code = p.product_code
AND i.product_se = 'PT02'
AND i.product_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productCode}) || '%'
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productName}) || '%'
GROUP BY i.product_code, p.product_name ORDER BY i.product_code ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT count(DISTINCT i.product_code) FROM inventory i join product_info p on i.product_code = p.product_code
AND i.product_se = 'PT02'
AND i.product_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productCode}) || '%'
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productName}) || '%'

SELECT i.lot, p.product_name, get_comm(i.product_size) as product_size, i.product_color, i.inventory_qy, i.store_charger, s.storage_info_name FROM inventory i join product_info p ON i.product_code = p.product_code join storage_info s on i.storage_location = s.storage_info_code WHERE i.product_size = #{sizeCode} AND i.product_color = #{color} AND i.product_code = #{productCode} AND i.inventory_qy > 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory i join product_info p on i.product_code = p.product_code
AND product_se = 'PT02' AND i.inventory_qy > 0
AND i.product_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productCode}) || '%'
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productName}) || '%'
AND i.product_color LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchColor}) || '%'
AND i.storage_location LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{location}) || '%'
AND i.lot LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchLot}) || '%'
AND i.product_size LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{sizeCode}) || '%'
AND TRUNC(i.store_date) >= #{startStoreDate}
AND TRUNC(i.store_date) >= #{endStoreDate}
AND TRUNC(i.store_date) BETWEEN #{startStoreDate} and #{endStoreDate}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO inventory_error e USING ( SELECT #{edto.productCode} AS product_code, #{edto.errorQy} AS error_qy, #{edto.errorInfo} AS error_info, sysdate AS process_date, #{name} AS error_charger, #{edto.lot} AS lot, #{edto.productColor} AS product_color, #{edto.productSize} AS product_size FROM dual ) new_data ON ( TRUNC(e.process_date) = TRUNC(new_data.process_date) AND e.lot = new_data.lot AND e.product_code = new_data.product_code AND e.product_color = new_data.product_color AND e.product_size = new_data.product_size AND e.error_info = new_data.error_info AND e.error_charger = new_data.error_charger ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET e.error_qy = e.error_qy + new_data.error_qy WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (error_code, product_code, error_qy, error_info, process_date, error_charger, lot, product_color, product_size) VALUES ( concat(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd'), LPAD(product_error_seq.nextval, 4, '0')), new_data.product_code, new_data.error_qy, new_data.error_info, new_data.process_date, new_data.error_charger, new_data.lot, new_data.product_color, new_data.product_size )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM( SELECT e.product_code, i.product_name, e.product_color, get_comm(e.product_size) as product_size, e.lot, e.process_date, e.error_charger, e.error_info, e.error_qy FROM inventory_error e join product_info i on e.product_code = i.product_code
AND e.product_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productCode}) || '%'
AND i.product_Name LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productName}) || '%'
AND e.product_color LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{color}) || '%'
AND e.product_size LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{sizeCode}) || '%'
AND e.lot LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchLot}) || '%'
AND e.error_charger LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{requestor}) || '%'
AND TRUNC(e.process_date) >= TO_DATE(#{startErrorDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TRUNC(e.process_date) <= TO_DATE(#{endErrorDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TRUNC(e.process_date) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startErrorDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endErrorDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
ORDER BY e.process_date desc )a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT p.product_code, ROUND((NVL(SUM(e.error_qy), 0) / NULLIF(NVL(SUM(i.store_qy), 0), 0)) * 100,1) AS totalErrorQy FROM product_info p LEFT JOIN inventory_error e ON p.product_code = e.product_code LEFT JOIN inventory i ON p.product_code = i.product_code GROUP BY p.product_code ORDER BY p.product_code
